mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") as callDate, engine_id, engine_version_id, organ_id, node_name, node_id, node_type, count(1) as total from t_monitor_node t where datediff(now(),t.create_time)=0 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d"), engine_id, engine_version_id, organ_id, node_name, node_id, node_type
